## ✅ Checklist
- [ ] `lint` end `typecheck` are successful (`npm run lint`, `npm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Added test
- [ ] Docs updated (README / wiki)
- [ ] Variable env updated (no leak in repo/CI)
- [ ] Tested on raspberry (if change uses HW/libcamera)
